    | timestamp = 00:07:23.360
    | text      = was that he didn't seem to have a human response to the attack.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.759

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:32.000

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.360

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:49.040
    | text      = pushing their experience to the side in order to use it for your own purposes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:53.600

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:01.279

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:08:06.240

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
